channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Clients
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Clients

item.title: CVE-2023-39205|2024-08-02T18:02:06.477Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Improper conditions check in Zoom Team Chat for Zoom clients may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39204|2024-08-02T18:02:06.451Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Buffer overflow in some Zoom clients may allow an unauthenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39206|2024-08-02T18:02:06.479Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Buffer overflow in some Zoom clients may allow an unauthenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39199|2024-08-02T18:02:05.986Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Cryptographic issues with In-Meeting Chat for some Zoom clients may allow a privileged user to conduct an information disclosure via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39218|2024-08-02T18:02:05.243Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Client-side enforcement of server-side security in Zoom clients before 5.14.10 may allow a privileged user to enable information disclosure via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-36539|2024-08-02T16:52:52.360Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Exposure of information intended to be encrypted by some Zoom clients may lead to disclosure of sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-43588|2024-08-02T19:44:43.701Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Insufficient control flow management in some Zoom clients may allow an authenticated user to conduct an information disclosure via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-36532|2024-08-02T16:52:52.384Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Buffer overflow in Zoom Clients before 5.14.5 may allow an unauthenticated user to enable a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-49646|2024-08-02T22:01:25.386Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Improper authentication in some Zoom clients before version 5.16.5 may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39215|2024-08-02T18:02:06.576Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Improper authentication in Zoom clients may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-43582|2024-08-02T19:44:43.848Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Improper authorization in some Zoom clients may allow an authorized user to conduct an escalation of privilege via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-36535|2024-08-02T16:52:52.352Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Client-side enforcement of server-side security in Zoom clients before 5.14.10 may allow an authenticated user to enable information disclosure via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24697|2024-02-13T23:53:43.589Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Untrusted search path in some Zoom 32 bit Windows clients may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24690|2024-02-14T00:00:04.089Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Improper input validation in some Zoom clients may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24698|2024-06-04T17:43:32.245Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Improper authentication in some Zoom clients may allow a privileged user to conduct a disclosure of information via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24699|2024-06-04T17:43:37.883Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Business logic error in some Zoom clients may allow an authenticated user to conduct information disclosure via network access.
